message: Let's start fair. I'll take the bigger share, but you get something too.
I'll take a smaller share this time, but I'm still not going to give you all the money.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share to make this worthwhile. Let's find a middle ground.
I'm not giving you the majority of the money, but I'm willing to compromise.
I'm coming down again, but this is my final offer.  If you want to keep playing, the money will keep shrinking, and eventually we'll both get nothing.
Let's split it down the middle, I'm not going to give you all the power in this negotiation.
